categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The liberation of Ralltiir occurred in 4 ABY, several days before the Battle of Brentaal IV. A resistance group, including Bettle and Jerell managed to knock out the planetary shields, allowing a fleet of six Mon Calamari Star Cruisers to attack the planet. Ralltiir was the first Core World to fall to the New Republic.
